verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* kindreds \w was|strong="H1961"\w* this: \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* frontier \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sin \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* uttermost part \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* coast.

\w Its|strong="H1961"\w* beginning \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w top|strong="H6437"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H6437"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* thereof, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* looketh \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H5437"\w* goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* towards \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w ascent|strong="H4610"\w* \w of|strong="H5045"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Scorpion, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* passeth \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sina: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* ascendeth \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Cadesbarne, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* reacheth \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Esron, \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Addar|strong="H0146"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* compassing Carcaa.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* thence \w passing|strong="H3318"\w* along \w into|strong="H4714"\w* Asemona, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* reaching \w the|strong="H1961"\w* torrent \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* bounds thereof \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* great \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* limit \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* coast.

But \w on|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w beginning|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* most \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: \w and|strong="H3220"\w* towards \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w from|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5704"\w* same \w river|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0068"\w* Beth-Hagla, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w into|strong="H0068"\w* Beth-Araba: \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Boen \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ruben.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* reaching \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w far|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Debara \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* \w looking|strong="H1961"\w* towards Galgal, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w opposite|strong="H5227"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ascent|strong="H4608"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Adommin, \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6828"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* torrent: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* passeth \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* called \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sun: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* goings \w out|strong="H0413"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fountain Rogel.

\w And|strong="H2022"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* compasseth \w from|strong="H3381"\w* Baala \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*: \w and|strong="H2022"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Jarim \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Cheslon: \w and|strong="H2022"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Bethsames, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* passeth \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Thamna.

\w And|strong="H2022"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* reacheth \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* part \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Accaron \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w*: \w and|strong="H2022"\w* bendeth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sechrona, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* passeth \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Baala: \w and|strong="H2022"\w* cometh \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Jebneel, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* bounded \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* great \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w These|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5439"\w* kindreds.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jephone \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6310"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Cariath-Arbe \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Enac. \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* thence \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Dabir, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* Cariath-Sepher, \w that|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* say, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* city \w of|strong="H3427"\w* letters.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* Cariath-Sepher, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w take|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* Axa \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Othoniel \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Cenez, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* younger \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*, \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* Axa \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w she|strong="H4100"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w moved|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* husband \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H4100"\w* sighed \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H4100"\w* sat \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* ass. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* aileth thee?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*: thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w southern|strong="H5045"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* dry \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w watered|strong="H4325"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* Caleb \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w upper|strong="H5942"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nether|strong="H8482"\w* watery \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
